Package com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly

Package contains native burstly ads implementations.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BurstlyFullscreenActivity.IDecorator The intention of this decorator is to decorate view, that will be shown as an interstitial.
BurstlyFullscreenActivity.IFullscreenView Interface describes fullscreen Burstly activity view.
IOverlayContainer Overlay container which overlays the main screen, showing arbitrary view as a fullscreen view.
OverlayContainer.IOverlayListener Interface to use to be notified about overlay events.
 

Class Summary
AbstractBurstlyAdaptor Abstract adaptor for Burstly related ads.
AudioControlReciever Class is used to control volume level for video.
BurstlyAdaptorFactory Factory implementation for Burstly related ads.
BurstlyFullscreenActivity Displays Burstly full screen interstitial.
BurstlyFullscreenConfiguration This class acts as a container for script and video configurations.
Not a thread safe.
BurstlyImageAdaptor Burstly image ad adaptor.
ClickLauncherSource This source is used to open script fullscreen after click tracked.
ClickResponseHandler Default Burstly track click response handler implementation.
CustomFullscreenOverlay<T extends AdaptorCustomFullscreen & IActivityLifeCycleAware> Custom fullscreen implmentation.
DayBasedCacheTimer Day based cache timer.
DefaultInterstitialDecorator Default decorator for interstitial view.
FullscreenParams Fullscreen parameters.
FullscreenParams.ScriptsParams Deprecated.
FullscreenParams.VideoParams Video parameters.
ImageCache This cache caches Bitmap files.
NoSeekMediaController MediaController with disabled functionaly to seek forward.
OverlayContainer<T extends View & IActivityLifeCycleAware> Overlayed container shows given child on the top of given parent in stack-like manner.
 

Package com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly Description

Package contains native burstly ads implementations.

Since:
1.0
